# üé¨ FilmRadar - Movie Search & Trailer Viewer  

FilmRadar is a web application that allows you to search for any movie, get detailed information about it, and watch related YouTube videos. üçø

## üöÄ Features  
- üîç Search for movies by title  
- üìñ View detailed movie information (plot, cast, release year, etc.)  
- üé• Watch related YouTube videos  
- üì± Responsive design for all devices
